TopicTitle: Orbits Change for no aparent reason, when time warping

Articles.Content:
I had this happen multiple times already, where the orbits of crafts I am not controlling change whithout any reason what so ever when time warping.

In this case the Vessel did not have any fuel nor was equipped with any command module.

So far this has also only happened with craft or sebris that were previosly connected to my Veheicle.
In the example shown below it was a booster I used to get into orbit, but it can also happen with a mothership when doing an Apollo-Style Mission.
